mapper.insert: INSERT INTO board(title, content, writer, type) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{writer}, #{type});
mapper.update: UPDATE board SET title = #{title}, content = #{content} WHERE bno = #{bno};
mapper.select: SELECT b.bno, b.originno, b.groupord, b. grouplayer, b.title, b.regdate, b.recommend, b.view, b.comment, m.name FROM board b, member m WHERE b.writer = m.mno ORDER BY b.bno DESC LIMIT #{pageStart}, 20;
